DOC.brief_summary: The study explore effect 6-week phospholipid drink intervention cognitive performance physiological subjective stress parameter male follow repeated psychosocial/physical stressor .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Phospholipid Drink Cognitive Performance Under Acute Stress
DOC.detailed_description: The study conforms randomise , double-blind , placebo control , parallel group design examine cognitive performance physiological/subjective stress response psychosocial/physical stressor six week daily intake phospholipid contain drink vs. placebo . The study examine : Cognitive performance follow acute stress prior , follow 6-weeks intake phospholipid contain drink placebo analogue . Physiological subjective stress response follow acute stress prior , follow 6-weeks intake phospholipid contain drink placebo analogue
DOC.criteria: Male ≥18 year old Healthy ( selfreport health questionnaire ) BMI < 30 kg/m² Free medication ( prescribed 'overthecounter ' ) Current psychological affective/mood disorder Selfreported physical disorder/disease ( significant cardiovascular , autoimmune , endocrine , gastrointestinal neurological condition , chronic pain , sleep disorder ) High chronic stress Smokers Recreational drug use ( within last month ) Night shift work Hypertension ( rest blood pressure exceed 160/95 mmHg ) Skin condition ( e.g . eczema ) hand Food allergy Participation clinical study within month prior screen participation Participation previous stress induction study
